title: datalad run   runs the command in the top directory of the dataset
body:
#### What is the problem?

must run it in the subdirectory where invoked.

#### What steps will reproduce the problem?

```shell
hopa:/tmp
$> datalad install ///openfmri/ds000001 
[INFO   ] Cloning http://datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000001 to '/tmp/ds000001' 
^CERROR: 
Interrupted by user while doing magic: KeyboardInterrupt() [subprocess.py:_communicate_with_poll:1156]
(dev) 2 5561 ->1.....................................:Sun 12 Nov 2017 11:41:30 AM EST:.
hopa:/tmp
$> export http_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:3128 https_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:3128 ftp_proxy=http://127.0.0.1:3128
(dev) 2 5562.....................................:Sun 12 Nov 2017 11:41:32 AM EST:.
hopa:/tmp
$> datalad install ///openfmri/ds000001                                                                     
[INFO   ] Cloning http://datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000001 to '/tmp/ds000001' 
[INFO   ] access to dataset sibling "datalad" not auto-enabled, enable with:
| 		datalad siblings -d "/tmp/ds000001" enable -s datalad 
install(ok): /tmp/ds000001 (dataset)
(dev) 2 5563.....................................:Sun 12 Nov 2017 11:41:37 AM EST:.
hopa:/tmp
$> cd ds000001/sub-01/
anat/  func/
(dev) 2 5564.....................................:Sun 12 Nov 2017 11:41:44 AM EST:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/ds000001[master]sub-01
$> datalad run "echo 123 > 123"        
[INFO   ] == Command start (output follows) ===== 
[INFO   ] == Command exit (modification check follows) ===== 
add(ok): 123 (file)                                                                                             
save(ok): /tmp/ds000001 (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
(dev) 2 5565.....................................:Sun 12 Nov 2017 11:41:48 AM EST:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/ds000001[master]sub-01
$> ls
anat/  func/
(dev) 2 5566.....................................:Sun 12 Nov 2017 11:41:49 AM EST:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/ds000001[master]sub-01
$> ls ..
123@                      participants.tsv  sub-04/  sub-08/  sub-12/  sub-16/
CHANGES                   sub-01/           sub-05/  sub-09/  sub-13/  task-balloonanalogrisktask_bold.json
README                    sub-02/           sub-06/  sub-10/  sub-14/
dataset_description.json  sub-03/           sub-07/  sub-11/  sub-15/
```
